QuestData.Title: Fire Upon the Waters
QuestData.Description: I have another mission for you.$B$BI was able to repurpose some of the blight to concoct my world-famous burning water. I want you to take it and set the sails of the Sinner's Folly ablaze!$B$BUse it from the dock. Once the sails are on fire, the deckhands will be busy putting them out, and you'll slip belowdecks to 'retrieve' the captain's rutters.$B$BYou'll find the ship on Crusader's Landing, below and south of New Hearthglen. Look for the captain's quarters on the first lower deck, behind the stairs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Apothecary Vicky Levine at Venomspite has asked you to use her Apothecary's Burning Water to set the sails of the Sinner's Folly afire.$B$BWhile the deckhands are busy attempting to put the fires out, head belowdecks and retrieve Captain Shely's Rutters from the captain.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please do NOT tell me that their sails were somehow protected from my burning water!$B$BI'd hate to have to test it out here again.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahhahahahahahahahaha!$B$BWithout their rutters, they've got nowhere to run to now.$B$BLooks to me like the end of the Scarlet Onslaught, and just when they were getting started. How sad.$B$BHeh.

Objectives.Objective: Sails of the Sinner's Folly set afire
